title.v: Tạo chứng từ tất toán cho các hóa đơn

items.key: status = '1' and ((ma_dvcs = '') or (ma_dvcs = @@unit)) and ((convert(smalldatetime, '{$%c[ngay_tt]}', 103) >= ngay_hl_tu or ngay_hl_tu is null) and (convert(smalldatetime, '{$%c[ngay_tt]}', 103) <= ngay_hl_den or ngay_hl_den is null)) and ma_nk in (select ma_nk from v20dmctnk where ma_ct = 'PT9' and (lstuser = '' or charindex(',' + rtrim(@@userName) + ',', ',' + replace(lstuser, ' ', '') + ',') > 0))
items.check: ((ma_dvcs = '') or (ma_dvcs = @@unit)) and ((convert(smalldatetime, '{$%c[ngay_tt]}', 103) >= ngay_hl_tu or ngay_hl_tu is null) and (convert(smalldatetime, '{$%c[ngay_tt]}', 103) <= ngay_hl_den or ngay_hl_den is null)) and ma_nk in (select ma_nk from v20dmctnk where ma_ct = 'PT9' and (lstuser = '' or charindex(',' + rtrim(@@userName) + ',', ',' + replace(lstuser, ' ', '') + ',') > 0))

command.text:
declare @$lockedDate nvarchar(512), @f varchar(32), @message nvarchar(512) select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where @ngay_tt between ngay_gh1 and ngay_gh2) begin select 'ngay_tt' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= @ngay_tt) begin select 'ngay_tt' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmctks where user_id = @@userID and ma_ct = 'PT9' and ngay_ks >= @ngay_tt) begin select 'ngay_tt' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end
select * into #$keys from @keys exec rs_AdvancedWriteOff '1', @ngay_tt, @ma_quyen, @maxLength, @dien_giai, '', @f out, @message out, @@language, @@userID, @@admin if @f is not null begin select @f as field, @message as message return end select '' as field, '' as message, 'refresh$&Identity;$(this);' as script return
